Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Injured on 5/25/2016 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to San Francisco on 2/8/2017 (Going to SF: P Roberto Ortiz, P Christopher Smith, 1B Robert Dunn. Going to SLB: P Jeffrey Horne)...
Earned first career win on 7/5/2017...
Had first career hit on 6/8/2018, off Shayne Funk (PHI)...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $608,571 through salary arbitration...
Traded from San Francisco to St. Louis (B) on 2/3/2021 (Going to SF: P Donald Cook, P Frank Babcock, P Thomas Carrillo. Going to SLB: P Christopher Smith)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2021...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $735,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 10/5/2022 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 9 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2022...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $735,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/1/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/5/2025 to a 4-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
Traded from Seattle to Philadelphia on 6/25/2028 (Going to SEA: P Robert Percival. Going to PHI: P Christopher Smith, 3B Jose Almendarez, SS John Delaney, P Edmundo Viveiros, P Pedro Sauceda)...
Traded from Philadelphia to Houston on 7/5/2028 (Going to HOU: P Christopher Smith. Going to PHI: P Juan Cardoso, LF Rodolfo Tabares)...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/6/2029 to a 2-year deal worth $1,550,000 per year...
